features.featureTitle: In frontend/src/pages/Cases.tsx, fix the hero section background image URL https://i.postimg.cc/ncL4hcQ9/Whats_App_Image_2026_02_26_at_6_16_08_PM_(1).jpg so it renders correctly. Properly encode the parentheses in the URL (replace '(' with '%28' and ')' with '%29') when used in a CSS background-image or inline style. Ensure the image renders with object-fit: cover, includes descriptive alt text if used as an , and does not have lazy-loading attributes that could prevent it from displaying in the hero section.

In frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx (and frontend/src/pages/Cases.tsx if service cards appear there), add an onClick handler to all five service cards (Civil, Criminal, Family, Property, Documentation) that navigates to /appointment using the React Router navigate function and then calls window.scrollTo(0, 0) to land at the top of the Appointment page (which contains the booking form).

Ensure every internal navigation action across the site forces a scroll-to-top. In frontend/src/App.tsx or a dedicated scroll-restoration component, call window.scrollTo(0, 0) on every route change using a router-level effect (e.g., listening to the router location/pathname). Additionally, ensure that the onClick handlers on navbar links, the 'Book Now' button, service card clicks, and any other programmatic navigation calls window.scrollTo(0, 0) either directly in the handler or via the router-level scroll restoration.
